programme.title: Sweet Stranger And Me
programme.desc: A 30-year-old woman suddenly has a new father who is three years younger than her. She doesn't trust him much at first, but as time passes by, she accepts him as family. This new father is always on her side. He loves her unconditionally. What would happen to them?(n)

programme.title: Boss In The Mirror
programme.desc: Korean celebrity-bosses go through self-examination to create a better working environment for their employees.(n)

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk
programme.desc: Alan is a rich kid looking forward to a busy 24 hours: his birthday celebration tonight and attending court as witness in a criminal trial the next morning. Alan's lawyer knows his client's unreliability, so he pressures Alan's dependable chum Chris to tag along.(n)

programme.title: Pee Nak
programme.desc: Three men on their way to monk-hood don't realise the temple at which they will receive their ordination is cursed by the wrath of Pee Nak, a mythical giant snake.(n)

programme.title: All My Goddess
programme.desc: Four ladies, Eileen, Zhou Li Jun, Chen Ruo Yan and Zhang Jia Xin were colleagues as stewardesses 10 years ago. They are reunited at Jia Xin's wedding and gather in a resort in Penang. The friends are introduced to the bridegroom Gary, a Prince Charming look-alike.(n)

programme.title: One Night Only
programme.desc: Having lost all his fortune and loved ones from gambling, Gao Ye walks out from prison to an even crueler world. Intrigued by a beautiful hooker who approaches him for unknown reason, he comes up a master plan to redeem everything he once had, but things spin wildly out of control.(n)

programme.title: When Ghost Meets Zombie
programme.desc: An expressionless zombie allows a free-spirited female ghost to possess him so she can use his body to enter a male beauty pageant.(n)

programme.title: The Kid From The Big Apple
programme.desc: As Sarah's mother has to relocate to China on a work assignment, she has to turn to her estranged father back in Malaysia. To a 12-year-old contemporary youngster like Sarah, Malaysia seems like her worst nightmare come true.(n)

programme.title: Make It Big Big
programme.desc: This reality comedy delves into the secret lives of the leading four radio-presenters, detailing how these celebrities deal with living in the public eye, meeting the daily expectations of their fans and their personal issues.(n)

programme.title: We Are Champions
programme.desc: Born into the bottom rungs of society, two teenage brothers with nothing but each other hope to change their fate through their love of basketball. Eventually, the brothers cross paths on their way to ultimate basketball glory - the HBL championship.(n)

programme.title: Lee Chong Wei
programme.desc: A biopic on Malaysia's badminton icon Datuk Wira Lee Chong Wei, starting with his early years as an aspiring young badminton player from Bukit Mertajam, all the way to becoming a world champion.(n)

programme.title: All's Well End's Well Extended Version
programme.desc: All's Well, Ends Well is a comic romance of three hapless brothers who eventually learn through their amorous exploits and misadventures that love is only won through gradual nurturing.(n)

programme.title: Days Of Being Wild
programme.desc: York, an amoral disillusioned and cruel young man is kept in luxury by his foster mother, a retired courtesan, who gives him everything but the one thing he needs to know.(n)

programme.title: Okinawa Rendez-Vous
programme.desc: Jimmy Wong is a famous thief who runs into mixed-up situations and possible romance while hanging out in Okinawa. Jimmy becomes the top target of Hong Kong cop Dat, who's vacationing with his girlfriend and her best pal.(n)

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow
programme.desc: Mark is a man of honour in a world of dishonour, and the sidekick to his former gang brother Tse-ho who is sent to the slammer. Ho comes out of jail determined to turn over a new leaf for the sake of his brother Kit, but his old enemy is equally determined to take him out of the picture.(n)

programme.title: Let The Bullets Fly
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Sichuan, bandit "Pocky" Zhang Mazi poses as a local governor in a dusty town, but finds himself at odds with the local mobster who is not eager to share his turf with another drifter. A complex and deadly series of mind-games ensues between the two crooks.(n)

programme.title: SPL2 A Time For Consequences
programme.desc: Undercover cop Kit becomes a junkie in order to catch Mr Hung. When the operation goes sour and Kit blows his cover, his supervisor and uncle, Wah, decides to terminate the operation. When Kit disappears without a trace, Wah tracks Kit to a prison in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: The Scoundrels
programme.desc: One night, a robber hijacks Rui when he accidentally spots a seriously injured woman in the vehicle. Now the police and the public see Rui as the suspect of the bank robbery. How can Rui get himself out of this quagmire?(n)

programme.title: Take 2
programme.desc: Tiger is a former gangster who took the rap for his boss Blackie; Mad Dog has apparently been convicted of every offence in the Penal Code; Panther was betrayed by his partner during a robbery attempt; while Jian Ren was a soon-to-be groom convicted of sex with an underage prostitute.(n)

programme.title: The Leakers
programme.desc: After a mutated Zika epidemic breaks out in Malaysia, an illegal hacker group, The Leakers, tries to disclose pharmaceutical company AMANAH Malaysia's conspiracy and crimes.(n)

programme.title: The Kid From The Big Apple 2
programme.desc: The sequel to the critically-acclaimed The Kid From The Big Apple. Sarah is back in Malaysia to spend her holiday with grandpa, who is showing signs of dementia.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: High schooler Nard is in a relationship with Mac. When Nard gets pregnant, her mother persuades her to abort the baby. However, Nard dies during the abortion, haunting the apartment complex.(n)

programme.title: Lost In Hong Kong
programme.desc: Xu Lai, who once dreamt of becoming a painter, has instead become a middle-aged man who has abandoned his ideals. When he goes on a trip to Hong Kong with his wife and her family, he plans to secretly meet up with his high school sweetheart who is in Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Meow
programme.desc: Alien life-form from a faraway planet has been residing on Earth for thousands of years. They transform themselves into cats and populate every area of the globe.(n)

programme.title: The Rope Curse
programme.desc: Hoping to make a viral video by streaming a mysterious rope ritual, a couple falls into a deadly curse instead that turns their lives upside down.(n)

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: Police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung-Sang finds himself in over his head when he is pulled into a 72-hour game by a cancer-suffering criminal out for vengeance on Hong Kong's organised crime syndicates.(n)

programme.title: A Man Called Hero
programme.desc: This story follows Hero Hua from an ill-omened June day in his youth to a showdown 17 years later with a disaffected member of his martial arts school, a Japanese named Invincible.(n)

programme.title: We Are Family
programme.desc: Finishing college can be scary and confusing. And for three irresponsible and particularly confused boys, college just got a lot more complicated. One day, their old friend Kaka unexpectedly returns home after studying abroad and brings with her an unexpected delivery: a baby!(n)

programme.title: Forever (SG)
programme.desc: Joey, a video consultant, shares romantic 'faux' wedding videos. The idea of fantasy and reality is blurred when she falls madly in love with a handsome music teacher from Taiwan.(n)

programme.title: Lost In Hong Kong
programme.desc: Xu Lai, who once dreamt of becoming a painter, has instead become a middle-aged man who has abandoned his ideals. When he goes on a trip to Hong Kong with his wife and her family, he plans to secretly meet up with his high school sweetheart who is in Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: The Lingering
programme.desc: A village woman in an aged family house has a husband who works in the city and a son who wants to leave for the city. One day, she is told that her husband has passed away in an accident. But he re-appears.(n)

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as a hardened special forces agent who fights to protect a young woman from a sinister criminal gang. At the same time, he feels a special connection to the young woman, like they had met in a different life.(n)

programme.title: A Journey Of Happiness
programme.desc: Hoping to fix her family's relationship, Siew Chen takes her father and brothers on a trip to Malaysia, where they fall into an unforgettable journey.(n)

programme.title: Call Of Heroes
programme.desc: During the warlords era in China, a village located in rural area called Pucheng falls into danger when the cruel commandant Cao from the enemy troops arrives and kills the innocent. The guardians of Pucheng are desperate to fight against Cao and protect their homeland.(n)

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: Like the sun and the moon, this couple can hardly see each other despite living in the same city, but their love endures amidst separation and opposition from Moon's mother.(n)

programme.title: Zombiepura
programme.desc: When a mysterious virus breaks out in an isolated army camp, a lazy reservist soldier and his tough commander must work together to survive, and learn what it means to be real soldiers.(n)

programme.title: The Bold, The Corrupt And The Beautiful
programme.desc: Madame Tang colludes and mediates between the government and private businesses for the benefits of her all-female family. One case does not go as planned, and an entire family close to Madame Tang falls victim to murder, changing Tang's relationships with her own family forever.(n)

programme.title: Ip Man 4 The Finale
programme.desc: The Wing Chun grandmaster finds a new fighting ground in San Francisco, where he reunites with Bruce Lee, duels with local martial arts masters and puts racist folks in their places.(n)

programme.title: Huat The Fish
programme.desc: This story revolves around the lives of four fishermen who are buddies from a fishing village at Pulau Ketam. In order to settle a huge loan, the four buddies decide to venture into robbery. In their attempt, the four buddies crash into a real robbery scene.(n)

programme.title: Monga
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s, Monga centres around five boys who join the Gang of Princes. As the Gang of Princes rise in stature, they come into conflict with other gangs jealous of their growing power.(n)

programme.title: Bakuman
programme.desc: Mashiro Moritaka has a knack for drawing. When classmate and aspiring writer Takagi Akito discovers Moritaka's drawing skills, he suggests they join forces to create a manga. Moritaka isn't so hot on the idea - that is, until a girl enters the picture to provide some extra motivation.(n)

programme.title: Love Forever
programme.desc: During the Jilin Past Stories Speech Competition in Beihua University, two students find out that their stories actually come from one love story during the Anti-Japanese War.(n)

programme.title: The Outsiders
programme.desc: Pei Yu Yan is a good student at school, and keeps a low profile as if she is a canary in a cage. Ever since she meets Yu Hao, her life changes; he is the boy who impresses her.(n)

programme.title: This Is Not What I Expected
programme.desc: An obsessive CEO of a company meets a ragged chef by chance. They are drawn closer together because of their love for delicacies, yet their personalities clash big-time.(n)

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: A storm is heading to the city. A crew of seasoned criminals led by the notorious Nam, armed with high-powered weapons, pulls off another smooth and violent armored car heist in broad daylight in a crowded street.(n)

programme.title: The Only Mom
programme.desc: A family moves out of town to raise an autistic daughter peacefully. The girl sleeps at daytime and awakes at night. The house gets stranger day by day with a mystery unsolved for decades.(n)

programme.title: Confession Of Pain
programme.desc: Inspector Bong discovers his girlfriend has committed suicide. Three years later, his old partner Hei, now a rising star in the police force, learns that his billionaire father-in-law has been ruthlessly murdered.(n)

programme.title: Tag Along 2
programme.desc: Social worker Li Shu-fen is often overwhelmed by her heavy workload and neglects her daughter Li Ya-ting as a result. When she discovers that Ya-ting has gone missing, she realises there is a past demon hidden at the bottom of her heart.(n)

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: Three delinquents run into an old house in the middle of the night. The house was once a general goods store where people could leave letters in the mailbox to seek advice.(n)

programme.title: The Menu
programme.desc: Following the events of the TV drama, Fong Ying has been promoted to interim chief editor and now has to deal with pressure to attract more online views and beat out an unscrupulous media rival. Meanwhile at a TV station, Tam sets off a bomb and demands a meeting with the Chief Executive.(n)

programme.title: Legend Of The Demon Cat
programme.desc: In the Tang Dynasty, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an City, causing a series of strange events. Poet Bai Letian and Monk Kukai join hands to investigate the death of Concubine Yang.(n)

programme.title: Once A Gangster
programme.desc: Roast Pork (Jordan Chan) joins the triad as a young man and ends up becoming a trusted lieutenant of boss Kerosene (Alex Fong Chung Sun). However, his true passion is in his successful chain of restaurants, his loving wife (Michelle Ye) and his two children.(n)

programme.title: Nozaki Shuhei - Auditor Of Bank
programme.desc: Nozaki Shuhei, a branch manager of the Oozora Bank, is informed that his branch is to be closed. But he is then promoted to become the auditor of the bank. An anonymous internal mail is found on his desk.(n)

programme.title: The Cases
programme.desc: Edmond Poon hosts psychic programmes, supported by the metapsychology masters from Southeast Asia who act as advisors, and leads a psychic exploring team to scout for little-known mysterious and supernatural cases.(n)

programme.title: Atm
programme.desc: College friends Ah Lok, Bo Zai and Ming Ming have been struggling financially since graduating. The three get involved in an ATM heist, but the machine accidentally ends up on the grounds of a retirement home.(n)

programme.title: Mr Pride And Miss Prejudice
programme.desc: Online writer Tang Nan Nan crosses path with Zhu Hou, a second-generation rich boy, resulting in hilarious situations and face-offs.(n)

programme.title: 23:59 The Haunting Hour
programme.desc: Recruit Tommy is bullied by his army mates. He seeks comfort from the compliments left by his readers on his blog that features fictitious army horror stories he writes. One day, things starts to go awry.(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Chinese archeology professor Jack teams up with beautiful Indian professor Ashmita and assistant Kyra to locate lost Magadha treasure. In a Tibetan ice cave, they find the remains of the royal army that had vanished together with the treasure, only to be ambushed by Randall.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor playboy finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago.(n)

programme.title: Deep Evil
programme.desc: A duo searches for clues to identify a headless victim, and they find it all pointing to a top plastic surgeon Kao.(n)

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: In 1941, a railroad worker in China leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.(n)

programme.title: Ah Boys To Men 4
programme.desc: After leaving the military, Lobang, Wayang King, Sergeant Ong and Ken Chow are all busy with their respective careers as civilians. That is until they are called back to serve the nation.(n)

programme.title: Iceman: The Time Traveller
programme.desc: The imperial guard and his three traitorous childhood friends get accidentally buried and are kept frozen in time. Four hundred years pass and they are defrosted, continuing the battle they left behind.(n)

programme.title: Vampire Cleanup Department
programme.desc: Hiding in this city is an official special action unit coping with vampires - the Vampire Cleanup Department (VCD). The street cleaners at midnight are vampire hunters, giant garbage bins contain the captured vampires, and the garbage station is their secret headquarters!(n)

programme.title: Single Day
programme.desc: Being the eldest child in his family, Cheng En is born to be unlucky. His brother accidentally makes his colleague pregnant, thus he meets a wedding planner, who is an unlucky woman. What will happen from there?(n)

programme.title: You Are The Apple Of My Eye
programme.desc: A group of close friends who attend a private school all have a debilitating crush on the sunny star pupil, Shen Jiayi. The only member of the group who claims not to is Ke Jingteng, but he ends up loving her as well.(n)

programme.title: Nozaki Shuhei - Auditor Of Bank
programme.desc: Nozaki continues to investigate the case. The CEO of the bank, Masahiko Kyogoku, confronts Nozaki. Sachiko Tachikawa becomes the first female branch manager of the bank.(n)

programme.title: If You Are The One 2
programme.desc: Wealthy middle-aged entrepreneur Qin and beautiful flight attendant Xiaoxiao Liang question their relationship after presiding over good friends Mang Guo and Shan Li's lavish "divorce ceremony".(n)

programme.title: Wayang Boy
programme.desc: The film follows 10-year-old Raja, an Indian boy who's recently been brought to Singapore by his stepmother Emma. After Raja gets into a scuffle with his new classmates Xavier and Shi Han, all three boys end up in detention.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Chef
programme.desc: Chi Ming runs off with his daughter after losing a custody battle with his late wife's father. Through a series of happenstances, they end up at the home of Chi Bao and her grandmother, who hail from a clan renowned for cooking.(n)

programme.title: The Tag-Along Devil Fish
programme.desc: Master Tiger, a Taoist god, seals a demon in the body of a fish. However, a small fish jumps out of the body and a boy brings it home. After that, a series of weird incidents happens.(n)

programme.title: The Fortune Handbook
programme.desc: Su Fu, a good-for-nothing man tries to steal an age-old Chinese pastry recipe from his own brother-in-law in a bid to sell it and get rich. Things quickly take a turn when a God of Fortune sees his plan and decides to turn his life upside down.(n)

programme.title: Distance
programme.desc: Businessman Chen travels to Guangxi for work. During a site visit, he catches sight of his estranged father. The father he resents is now a crippled old man who doesn't recognise him.(n)

programme.title: All's Well End's Well
programme.desc: The Yau brothers team up with fellow con-artists - the Lui sisters - to scam an infamous mob boss.(n)

programme.title: Napping Princess
programme.desc: In the near future, a high-school senior discovers that events in her waking life begin to parallel events in her dreams.(n)

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: San and Yo work as bodyguards-for-hire in Hong Kong, but business isn't exactly booming for these bumbling buddies. The two head to South Korea for a mysterious job to protect a reporter, but a hotel bombing leaves the client dead and sends them on the run as suspects.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrow Is Another Day
programme.desc: Wong Kam Fa is a middle-aged housewife whose life revolves around her 20-year-old autistic son. After learning that her husband is having an affair, she plots to take revenge on the mistress.(n)

programme.title: Iceman Cometh
programme.desc: A frozen Ming Dynasty royal guard and the equally frigid rapist-killer he's tracking are thawed out in modern-day Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Security Unlimited
programme.desc: This film is about the misadventures of three employees of a private security company in Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Her Fatal Ways III
programme.desc: Mainland policewoman Do Do Cheng is given a top-secret assignment to go to Hong Kong and look after the safety of an old Mr. Chien, a member of the Communist Party's Central Committee. Do Do finds herself in a plane, accompanied by her regular sidekick Cheung.(n)

programme.title: Truant Heroes
programme.desc: The war against organised crime in Hong Kong has opened a new front - the school. Police Commandant Wong orders Officer Kin to go undercover as a school teacher.(n)

programme.title: United We Stand
programme.desc: Coach Wong is in charge of a girls' summer track training programme. Though the girls are initially skeptical of Wong's abilities, she earns their respect by beating them in a race every time.(n)

programme.title: 92 The Legendary La Rose Noire
programme.desc: A movie hero of the 60s called Black Rose was actually real, and a woman in the 90s is mistaken for her because she's in the wrong place at the wrong time.(n)

programme.title: It's A Mad Mad Mad World 2
programme.desc: The Biu family's luck changes as Bill's job promotion and his daughters' education and work send the entire family to lead their new lives in Canada, where new misadventures await.(n)

programme.title: Double Fattiness
programme.desc: Siu Fung, an owner of a pizzeria, unexpectedly succumbs to a heart attack. However, her spirit was unable to cross over to the other side, thus she resurrects into the body of a young woman.(n)

programme.title: My Lucky Star ()
programme.desc: Yip is attractive, but for some strange reason no man has ever been interested in her. Yip meets Lai, a fengshui expert, and thinks Lai can change her luck. But Duen, also a famous fengshui expert, continually casts all kinds of spells on Yip. A battle of fengshui and horoscope techniques ensues.(n)

programme.title: The Saint Of Gamblers
programme.desc: Blackie Tat looks for a new Saint of Gamblers, and finds him in the form of a dim-witted mainlander.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Mei Loi is pregnant after spending a night with Domoto Sei. Mei Loi kills the whole crew in the studio to quench her thirst for blood. Kau believes the child of a vampire is destined to be the Demon Star.(n)

programme.title: Trouble Couples
programme.desc: Family tradition dictates that spinsterish Anita Mui marry before her younger sisters, so they try to fix her up with Eric Tsang.(n)

programme.title: Millionaires Express
programme.desc: The No. 1 comedy hit of 1986 has kung-fu master Sammo Hung involved with officials, concubines, merchants and conmen in old China.(n)

programme.title: Web Of Deception
programme.desc: Brigitte Lin is a blackmailed executive in this tense thriller. Suspects include Joey Wang, Pauline Wong and Elizabeth Lee.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Coconut
programme.desc: Mr. Coconut arrives in town from Hainan, China. Here in the sophisticated urban jungles of Hong Kong, Mr. Coconut is finally reunited with his family as he endures Hong Kong's streets of the late 1980s, filled with stock and property gamblers, heavy mobile phones and more.(n)

programme.title: Peking Opera Blues
programme.desc: Set in 1913 Beijing, the film depicts the adventures of a team of unlikely heroines: Tsao Wan, a patriotic rebel who dresses as a man; Sheung Hung, a woman in search of a missing box of jewels; and Bai Niu, the daughter of a Peking Opera impresario.(n)

programme.title: Eighth Happiness
programme.desc: This comedy tells the story of three brothers - the mincingly effeminate Fang Chien Lang, cartoonist Chien Sang, and their middle-aged older sibling, Chien Hui.(n)

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy
programme.desc: A man is hired to look after a spoiled rich girl, but is then pulled into a scheme meant to re-evaluate her life.(n)

programme.title: Tiger Cage 2
programme.desc: An ex-cop and divorce lawyer team up with a gangster to clear their names after getting involved in a dirty money scheme led by a vicious money launderer.(n)

programme.title: Her Fatal Ways II
programme.desc: Inspector Cheng Shih Nan leaves the Mainland with her cousin Hsiou Sheng to tackle a Hong Kong-related murder. They get help from their Hong Kong brethren, and the race is on to find the bad guys.(n)

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Stephen Chow stars as the youngest son in a family run by dad Roy Chiao. Dad only wants his sons to be independent, happily-married men, but it's tough going for the honest, hardworking patriarch.(n)

programme.title: Always On My Mind
programme.desc: Michael is a money-grubbing news anchor who's just discovered that he has cancer. The TV station he works at is also looking to fire him. Before the station has a chance to finalise the firing, though, the news anchor finds fame overnight thanks to his coverage of a sensational robbery.(n)

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hitman Ah Jong is on his last job for the Hong Kong triad, but accidentally damages the eyes of a young nightclub singer named Jennie in a shootout. After the attack, Ah Jong begins to watch Jennie perform at the nightclub and escorts her home when she is attacked by thugs.(n)

programme.title: Who's The Woman, Who's The Man
programme.desc: This sequel to the comedy He's a Woman, She's a Man, picks up right where the original left off! Sam and his cross-dressing protege Wing have finally professed their love for each other, but now what? The two move in together, but a shared life is tough on the private.(n)

programme.title: To Be Number One
programme.desc: This is the story of Ho, a Chinese peasant and slave worker who escapes to Hong Kong and becomes one of the most feared crime bosses in Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Brief Encounter In Shinjuku
programme.desc: Ultimate yuppie Lawrence Cheng is caught between wife DoDo Cheng and secretary Rosamund Kwan in this witty comedy.(n)

programme.title: The Contract
programme.desc: Struggling actor Chih-Wen got a raw deal from his company by signing a binding eight-year contract. Soon, he receives a better offer from a rival company. He and his brother, with the help of magician Shih-Chieh, attempt to steal the contract from his ruthless manager.(n)

programme.title: Game Of Death ()
programme.desc: Legendary screen icon Bruce Lee stars as Billy Lo, a burgeoning martial arts star drawn into a web of corruption. On the verge of becoming a martial arts screen star, Billy Lo is approached by an evil group called The Syndicate to join their illicit endeavours. What will Billy do?(n)

programme.title: City War
programme.desc: Idealistic cop Chow Yun-Fat and jaded veteran Ti Lung team up to stop a vicious criminal intent on destroying them both.(n)

programme.title: Heart To Hearts
programme.desc: George Lam is Alex, a music producer who moonlights as a choir teacher. He takes a shine to one of his students, but her overprotective mother thinks he might be trying to date her.(n)

programme.title: Troublesome Night 3
programme.desc: Morgue makeup artist "Shishedo" is a fan of pop star Lam Wing Si. Lam Wing Si dies in a car accident and her face is a complete mess. Tong decides to make herself look like Lam, and takes her place in the coffin for the guests to take a final look.(n)

programme.title: Forbidden City Cop
programme.desc: In Ancient China, Ling Ling Fat is an Imperial agent whose inventive genius and lack of actual kung-fu skills makes him initially unpopular with the Emperor. But Fat's way with inventions gives him an edge on the invaders from the Gum province.(n)

programme.title: An Autumn's Tale
programme.desc: This story deals with two people from different social backgrounds who begin the unlikeliest of romances in a land far from home.(n)

programme.title: Three (3) Wishes
programme.desc: A century ago, Blackheart Ghost was known for his kindness, but he also caused the world to become unbalanced between good and evil.(n)

programme.title: Road Warriors
programme.desc: Lee leads a Police Traffic Unit. During an operation, a subordinate of his is killed by the gang. Lee is determined to arrest the murderers.(n)

programme.title: Farewell China
programme.desc: Set primarily in New York City, the film revolves around Zhou who follows his wife's journey to America, and the tough surprises in store for him in the "Promised Land".(n)

programme.title: Crime Story
programme.desc: Inspector Eddie Chan is a brilliant but emotionally-troubled cop assigned to protect a real-estate mogul threatened with kidnapping. Unfortunately he's unable to prevent the abduction. Eddie is paired with cop Hung to track the kidnappers to Taiwan, but things seem to work against them.(n)

programme.title: It's A Mad Mad Mad World
programme.desc: Bill, a TV news reporter, tries to make ends meet to support himself, his wife and three teenage daughters in urban Hong Kong. In the mist of the misadventures of Bill and his family, their luck and lives ultimately change when Bill's wife suddenly wins the lottery.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: In the near future, 10 men are voted as the 10 who could lead the world; on the list is Hong Kong scientist Dr Ken. When some of the figures on the list start dying in suspicious cases of spontaneous human combustion, the Hong Kong CID and the British MI6 get involved to try to protect Dr Ken.(n)

programme.title: King Of Beggars
programme.desc: The spoilt son of a millionaire finds the love of his life, but she will only accept him if he proves himself as a kung-fu master. He enters and wins the Kung-Fu Scholar tournament, little realising that this victory will lead to him becoming penniless, homeless and sleepy.(n)

programme.title: Fatal Love
programme.desc: A romantic thriller with lovers Leslie Cheung and Cherie Chung facing death at the hands of her gangster ex-boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: The Seventh Curse
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat is Wisely, Hong Kong's Indiana Jones, in an adventure involving a Thai curse and a Buddhist gem.(n)

programme.title: Shanghai Shanghai
programme.desc: Little Tiger ventures from the sticks to the big city in search of his cop brother Big Tiger, an honest cop working in a corrupt system.(n)

programme.title: Three Of A Kind
programme.desc: Famous novelist Ngan (Michael Hui) is leading a comfortable life living on the royalties of his published novels. He has now placed all his attention onto his daughter Sophia (Miriam Yeung).(n)

programme.title: Fruit Punch
programme.desc: Hacken and his friends run their business but fail repeatedly. Even with a rich man's support, the business and his romance are still at stake.(n)

programme.title: Mortuary Blues
programme.desc: The rays of the moon bring a coven of female zombies back to life. A special police squad is assigned to stop them.(n)

programme.title: Esprit D'amour ()
programme.desc: Ringo Lam's directorial debut casts Alan Tam as an insurance investigator engaged to Cecilia Yip, but who falls in love with ghost Joyce Ngai.(n)

programme.title: Righting Wrongs
programme.desc: Jason Hsia Ling-ching is a dedicated prosecutor who tries to maintain tolerance under the somewhat flimsy laws of the court. However, when his mentor is gunned down and the key witness of Hsia's latest case and his family are wiped out, Hsia can no longer go by the book.(n)

programme.title: Just For Fun
programme.desc: Rich playboy Big Lamp comes back from France to inherit his just-deceased father's fortune, only to discover much to his dismay that his dad has donated all his wealth to charity.(n)

programme.title: New Fist Of Fury
programme.desc: With the death of Chen Chun, the Jing Wu martial arts school is under the great attack of the Japanese.(n)

programme.title: The Law Enforcer
programme.desc: Police officer Kent spots a robbery and rescues a girl, Anna. Kent also hurts gangster Bad Brain when saving a taxi driver. Bad Brain joins mobster Tiger in a jewellery robbery. He meets Anna again and injures her. He also kills Kent's fellow officer. Kent vows to catch Bad Brain.(n)

programme.title: Lai Shi, China's Last Eunuch
programme.desc: In a village in the Shantung Province, Lai Shi, the nine-year-old son of a poor family, decides to be a eunuch. Finding no place for himself in the service of the Emperor, this eunuch's life goes through dramatic turns, eventually taking him to a railway station, where fate takes a hand.(n)

programme.title: Project A II
programme.desc: Dragon Ma is assigned to a corrupt police precinct, and brings a squad of righteous officers with him to clean up the territory. But the influence of corrupt Superintendent Chun runs deep, and some of the pirates who threatened Ma in Project A are back looking for revenge.(n)

programme.title: It's A Drink! It's A Bomb
programme.desc: An explosives expert builds a new-fangled bomb that's disguised as a can of cola. He sells it to evil Japanese terrorists Eddy Ko and Tsui Kam-Kong, but not before his assistant absconds with the cola. During the ensuing chase, three mismatched strangers are brought together.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Fan Yan stops Mei Loi from biting him. Domoto Sei enters Mei Loi's dream and find outs about her pregnancy. Mei Loi is afraid of giving birth to a Demon Star. Kau discovers that Fan Yan's power comes from the tumour in his brain.(n)

programme.title: The Hitman
programme.desc: Fu is an ex-solider adept at kung-fu fighting. When a triad discovers Fu's fighting prowess, they entreat the gentle tough guy to help score a $100-million bounty placed on the "King of Assassins". But hitmen of all shapes and sizes appear to claim the reward for themselves!(n)

programme.title: Finale In Blood
programme.desc: Fruit Chan makes his directorial debut with this intriguing mixture of horror, farce and sex involving a DJ and a beautiful ghost.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China
programme.desc: Set in late 19th-century Canton, this film depicts the stance taken by martial arts hero Wong Fei-Hung against foreign forces' plundering of China. When Aunt Yee arrives back from America totally westernised, Wong Fei-Hung assumes the role of her protector.(n)

programme.title: Merry Christmas
programme.desc: Danny Chan and Loletta Lee urge their widowed dad Karl Maka to date neighbour Paula Tsui, who is also pursued by Yuen Woo Ping.(n)

programme.title: Yes, Madam
programme.desc: Asprin and Strepsil are two petty thieves who inadvertently become involved in a murder case when they steal items belonging to a murdered man. The man had hidden an important microfilm in his passport, which the thieves pass on to a forger friend Panadol.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Vampire II
programme.desc: Modern grave-robbing archeologists find perfectly-preserved specimens from the past of a family. These are vampires immobilised only by the paper spells pasted on their foreheads.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Fortune
programme.desc: A toy designer falls in love with a rich girl whose father gives him a toy factory to run. Soon, the couple is sabotaged by another employee.(n)

programme.title: Easy Money
programme.desc: A car transporting several billion dollars is caught in a traffic jam. Robbers come from all different directions. The police puts Senior Inspector Cheung to be in charge of this case. Lam, a representative from the insurance company, also joins the investigation.(n)

programme.title: The Protector
programme.desc: Two New York City cops, Billy Wong and Danny Garoni, head to Hong Kong after the daughter of a rich businessman is kidnapped by the drug lord, Mr. Ko.(n)

programme.title: Read Lips
programme.desc: Countless hours spent enunciating dialogue over Hong Kong movie productions come in handy when a professional dubber reads a dastardly scheme on the soundless lips of a bad guy and resolves to put a stop to things.(n)

programme.title: Beware Of Pickpockets
programme.desc: Dean Shek stars as a pickpocket with a heart of gold, who with his seven young orphan charges hide from the law in a dilapidated old church called Fairyland.(n)

programme.title: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Two cute kids plot to reunite parents Sam Hui and Olivia Cheng.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Match ()
programme.desc: Frankie Chan is a smooth-talking car salesman who meets his match when he encounters bumbling private eye Josephine Siao.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China III
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung visits Beijing during a competition designed to determine which group has the best lion dancers.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Jan Jan is severely injured. Fan Yan saves her at all costs. On his way to look for Fan Yan and Mei Loi, Tin Yau is stopped by Kei Nok. Black Rain shows up and explains the past about Fan Yan and Jan Jan.(n)

programme.title: All The Wrong Clues
programme.desc: A private investigator and a police inspector team up to pursue a notorious mobster who is plotting to milk an old millionaire. The investigator crosses paths with a femme fatale and silly gangsters.(n)

programme.title: The Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Yuen Biao is the son of a rich family and thinks he is the best fighter in town, but in fact his father fixes the fights. After he loses a fight, he wants a master to teach him how to fight and so become really the best fighter.(n)

programme.title: Law With Two Phases
programme.desc: Policeman Danny Lee has self-doubt after accidentally killing an innocent kid during a shoot-out.(n)

programme.title: Full Throttle
programme.desc: One of Hong Kong's top motorcycle racers is forced to reevaluate his entire way of life after a serious accident and the loss of a close friend.(n)

programme.title: Thank You, Sir
programme.desc: Four teenage cadets experience a stern and rigorous life in a police academy led by idealistic superintendent Danny Lee.(n)

programme.title: King Of The Chess
programme.desc: Contrasting dramas of contemporary Taiwan and the Cultural Revolution emphasise the theme of chess as a metaphor for life.(n)

programme.title: The Haunted Cop Shop
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police station used to be a clubhouse of the Japanese during World War II. In the present time, after thief Sneaky Ming is captured and incarcerated at the station, he is lured into a world of the paranormal by the spirits of those still inhabiting the building.(n)

programme.title: Love On A Diet
programme.desc: Mimi Mo is an exchange student in Japan who fell in love with budding pianist Kurokawa. Kurokawa later leaves to study in the USA and returns to Japan as a famous musician. Mimi has dealt with her depression by eating and now weighs over 300 pounds. Mimi meets Fatty who helps her lose weight.(n)

programme.title: Sworn Brothers
programme.desc: A tough look at the Hong Kong underworld with Andy Lau and Cheung Kwok-keung, two pals who stand on different sides of the law.(n)

programme.title: The Way Of Dragon
programme.desc: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.(n)

programme.title: Will Of Iron
programme.desc: Maggie returns to Hong Kong to accompany her grandmother to Canada. She takes the opportunity to visit her old friends Carol and Jacky. Little does she know that Jacky has become a drug addict. More surprisingly, the drug dealer is Maggie's boyfriend, Michael.(n)

programme.title: Making It
programme.desc: Five young men who form a band called Wynners finally get a job to perform in a nightclub. However during their debut, Alan, a member of the band, is hospitalised. Wah is spotted by the Wynners' manager and is asked to appear with the band that night pretending to be Alan.(n)

programme.title: Till Death Shall We Start
programme.desc: Anthony Chan stars as David, an unfortunate bachelor ghost who must find a woman to marry in order to be eligible for reincarnation.(n)

programme.title: House On Wheels
programme.desc: Sung Dong-il, Kim Hee-won and Yeo Jin-goo build a tiny, portable home and travel with it around Korea, bringing only essential belongings to live a minimal and green lifestyle.(n)

programme.title: I-LAND Part.2
programme.desc: Don't miss Part 2 of Big Hit Entertainment's audition project 'I-LAND', and witness the birth of the next generation's K-POP group!(n)

programme.title: Flower Of Evil
programme.desc: A psychopath falsifies everything about his cruel past to marry his wife. However, his secrets are soon revealed after his wife, a detective, doubts him as a suspect of a murder case.(n)

programme.title: Live
programme.desc: Live depicts the everyday life of police officers of different ranks - the stress, the struggles, the joy and the sorrow as they uphold justice.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant On Wheels: China
programme.desc: Korean star chef Lee Yeon-bok is opening a food truck with Kim Kang-woo, Seo Eun-soo, Heo Kyung-hwan in China selling Korean-style Chinese cuisine! Will their dishes suit the locals' appetite?(n)

programme.title: Mother's Touch: Korean Side Dishes
programme.desc: A veteran actress and a master in the kitchen, Kim Su-mi shares her recipes with three chefs specialising in foreign cuisine, and teaches them the secrets of Korean home-cooking.(n)

programme.title: Hometown Flex
programme.desc: Featuring K-stars in each episode, MC Cha Tae-hyun and Lee Seung-gi travel to each guest's hometown to experience different lifestyles outside Seoul.(n)
